xFarm is an innovative platform that combines the joy of virtual farm ownership with the transformative capabilities of blockchain technology. This revolutionary platform offers a dynamic and engaging environment for users to raise, care for, and even trade their virtual companions.
xFarm will appear on twitter as a sidebar panel, this helps users have a better experience when using twitter and playing xFarm.
